title: So This Is the Grown-Up Way to Style a White T-Shirt Right Now
author: Drew Elovitz
text: Actress Julianne Moore was spotted in NYC this week promoting her new Netflix show, Sirens, a dark comedy with a preppy fashion twist. Combining tailored suiting pieces and casual basics, Moore's latest look is posh enough for the office.A dark navy three-button vest and matching creased trousers set the tone, while a boxy white tee, woven handbag, and pointy-toe Chelsea boots rounded out the look. Complete with Moore's signature fiery red hair in a short-for-summer shoulder-length bob, it's an easy outfit combination that will quickly enter my weekly wardrobe rotation.Whether your upcoming plans are business or pleasure-oriented, we've re-created this outfit in both suiting and denim versions. Keep scrolling and choose a set that suits your fancy. I'll be over here streaming Sirens for more summer fashion inspo. (Image credit: Getty Images)On Julianne Moore: Jennifer Fisher Lilly Hinged Huggies ($250)Shop Pieces to Re-Create the Look Mango Denim-Effect Lyocell Vest Lyocell makes this vest super soft. Mango Wide-Leg Lyocell Trousers With Pleats Wear the matching trousers with 100 different outfits. The best white tees are 100% cotton. Mango Pointed Toe Booties Black pointy toe boots are very versatile. Mango Braided Leather Shoulder Bag Mix dark brown and black accessories just like Moore. Jennifer Fisher Lilly Hinged Huggies Julianne Moore is wearing these exact earrings. Aire Bellatrix Sunglasses A subtle cat eye is always fun. Mavi Jeans Peony Colorblock Raw Hem Denim Vest Look for a denim vest with matching jeans for a more concert-ready take on the outfit. Mavi Jeans Malibu Wide Leg Jeans We love the two-tone denim look. Nordstrom Pima Cotton Slub Crewneck T-Shirt Another comfortable all-cotton option. Madewell Handwoven Leather Tote Madewell's leather goods are always a great buy. Aurate New York Gold Smooth Arch Hoops Medium These chunky hoops are still lightweight. Square shades are very Hollywood. Marc Fisher LTD Yanara Pointed Toe Booties A chunky block heel works well with trousers. Explore More: Julianne Moore
html:
Actress Julianne Moore was spotted in NYC this week promoting her new Netflix show, Sirens, a dark comedy with a preppy fashion twist. Combining tailored suiting pieces and casual basics, Moore's latest look is posh enough for the office.

A dark navy three-button vest and matching creased trousers set the tone, while a boxy white tee, woven handbag, and pointy-toe Chelsea boots rounded out the look. Complete with Moore's signature fiery red hair in a short-for-summer shoulder-length bob, it's an easy outfit combination that will quickly enter my weekly wardrobe rotation.

Whether your upcoming plans are business or pleasure-oriented, we've re-created this outfit in both suiting and denim versions. Keep scrolling and choose a set that suits your fancy. I'll be over here streaming Sirens for more summer fashion inspo.

On Julianne Moore: Jennifer Fisher Lilly Hinged Huggies ($250)
